channel.title: Old Save Files
channel.description:
Hi guys! Iv played BMS since 2012... But yestardey, I download new Early Accses version (0.1.1) And when I try to load old save file, its crushed... On "connecting" period of load. Also when I creat new save file its load perfectly, but not with old saves.
How I can fix this problem and load on this new version my good-old saves?)
Please, its very important for me.
Sorry for bad English, Im russian.

item.title: Old Save Files
item.dc:creator: TextFAMGUY1
item.description:
Old saves will definitely never work. Even saves from previous patches on the retail version do not work properly.

If you want to start a new game from whatever chapter you were on in the mod release, you can use the console command:

sv_unlockedchapters 15

On the main menu, and this will unlock all chapters. You can then start a new game from whatever chapter you were on before.

Read full topic

item.title: Old Save Files
item.dc:creator: danielsangeo
item.description:
Old saves will not work on new versions because the new version is essentially a different game. You will have to start a new game. If the chapter you were on is still available to you, you can start there.

Sorry for any inconvenience.

Read full topic
